article_title: Israel launches fresh airstrikes in Gaza.
sentence: It  said  the  former  Al-Bureij  Preparatory  School  was  being  used  by  Hamas  to  plot  attacks  on  Israel,  and  that  steps  were  taken  to  avoid  hurting  civilians,  including  using  "precise  munitions,  aerial  surveillance,  and  additional  intelligence  information"  Separately,  at  least  nine  people  were  killed  and  20  were  injured  in  an  Israeli  airstrike  on  a  school  housing  displaced  people  in  Gaza,  according  to  Reuters  citing  Palestinian  news  agency  Wafa.
